nodes.text: An airbus was a repulsorlift air transport vessel found on worlds such as Coruscant during the reign of the Galactic Republic and the Galactic Empire.

Some airbuses were used as public transports, while others were reserved to members of the government, or members of the Jedi Order. The simplistic structures of air buses meant that a design could be scaled upwards and downwards, accommodating smaller speeder-sized vehicles for short bus-routes and behemoth vessels for trans-continental and trans-orbital journeys.
